Package ruman.semestral_work

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
ruman.semestral_work.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
Manages setup of GUI components, primarily their action handlers.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private class  Controller.FileTreeCellImpl
    A custom implementation of TreeCell class that enables changes at the level of AppState.file_tree as well as on the filesystem level reflecting name change initiated by user.

      void fillTreeView​(javafx.scene.control.TreeItem<FileTree> root) throws java.io.IOException
      Fills TreeView component with items corresponding to journal entries and groups recursively.
      Parameters:
      root - TreeItem containing FileTree whose descendants we want to add
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • setupNoteTree

      void setupNoteTree()
      Sets up selection functionality of TreeView component note_tree (connects it with buttons that manage it and editor), assigns a custom cell factory to it.

    • setupAppState

      void setupAppState()
      Initializes AppState instance corresponding to currently running Journal application with existing / new configuration, displays the journal in TreeView component.

      new_value - value the disabled property will be set to

    • addItem

      void addItem​(ElementType type)
      Add new TreeItem into note_tree together with associated FileTree, save to filesystem.
      Parameters:
      type - type of newly added item

    • getNewName

      java.lang.String getNewName​(ElementType type, FileTree file_tree)
      Get a unique name for the new TreeItem based on already existing siblings.
      Parameters:
      type - type of item
      file_tree - a FileTree to which we are trying to append a child
      Returns:
      a name no other item on that level has

      public void setupKeyboardShortcuts()
      Set keyboard shortcuts used in this application.
